from pyspark.sql import functions as F, types as T
from pyspark.sql import Row
import json, datetime

# parameters (supplied by pipeline)
getp = mssparkutils.notebook.getNotebookParameter

entity        = getp("entity",        "")
run_id        = getp("runId",         "")
ingest_date   = getp("ingestDate",    "")
raw_base_path = getp("rawBasePath",   "")
record_count  = int(getp("recordsIngested", "0"))
status        = getp("status",        "Succeeded")  # Succeeded|Warning|Failed
files_written = int(getp("filesWritten", "0"))
source        = "service-bus"

assert entity and run_id and ingest_date and raw_base_path, "Missing required parameters"

# compose manifest
manifest = {
    "entity": entity,
    "source": source,
    "runId": run_id,
    "ingestDate": ingest_date,
    "writtenAt": datetime.datetime.utcnow().strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"),
    "recordsIngested": record_count,
    "filesWritten": files_written,
    "status": status
}

# location: raw/<entity>/ingest_date=YYYY-MM-DD/run_id=<RUN_ID>/manifest.json
manifest_dir  = f"{raw_base_path}/ingest_date={ingest_date}/run_id={run_id}"
manifest_path = f"{manifest_dir}/manifest.json"

# ensure directory exists, then write a single json file
mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs(manifest_dir)
mssparkutils.fs.put(manifest_path, json.dumps(manifest), True)

# upsert watermark
spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_meta_db")
spark.sql("USE odw_meta_db")

# ensure table exists
spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS watermarks (
  entity            STRING,
  source            STRING,
  last_ingest_time  TIMESTAMP,
  ingest_date       STRING,
  run_id            STRING,
  manifest_path     STRING,
  records_ingested  BIGINT,
  status            STRING,
  updated_at        TIMESTAMP
) USING DELTA
""")

now_ts = datetime.datetime.utcnow().strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")

df = spark.createDataFrame([
  Row(entity=entity,
      source=source,
      last_ingest_time=now_ts,
      ingest_date=ingest_date,
      run_id=run_id,
      manifest_path=manifest_path,
      records_ingested=record_count,
      status=status,
      updated_at=now_ts)
])

# MERGE (upsert) by (entity, source, ingest_date)
df.createOrReplaceTempView("wm_upd")

spark.sql("""
MERGE INTO odw_meta_db.watermarks AS tgt
USING wm_upd AS src
ON  tgt.entity = src.entity
AND tgt.source = src.source
AND tgt.ingest_date = src.ingest_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
  tgt.last_ingest_time = src.last_ingest_time,
  tgt.run_id           = src.run_id,
  tgt.manifest_path    = src.manifest_path,
  tgt.records_ingested = src.records_ingested,
  tgt.status           = src.status,
  tgt.updated_at       = src.updated_at
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT *
""")

print(f"manifest: {manifest_path}")
print(f"watermark upserted for {entity} / {ingest_date}")

# return a tiny json for pipeline logging if you want
print(json.dumps({"manifestPath": manifest_path, "records": record_count, "status": status}))
